title: Love Me Better Than
alternative_title: 러브미 베러 댄 ;Love Me Better Then
status: 러브미 베러 댄 ;Love Me Better Then
description:
Description :
        [Unrequited love, pure-hearted Evan x cheeky, active Dennis]Evan falls for Dennis at first sight, but hides his feelings for him. Dennis, unaware of his feelings, finds Evan - who always seems to flirt with his girlfriends - to be a thorn in his side. The relationship between the two, who have always been bickering, begins to change after Dennis announces his breakup...
